post.author: 김명대
post.content:
The following book is easy to understand with abundant examples for CICS/COBOL/DB2.


book name: DB2 for the COBOL programmer
                 Part 1 & 2 (2 books)
Author: Steve Ecklos
publisher: Mike Murach & Associates Inc.


>Hello,
>
>Please let me know any good books (manual) for CICS/COBOL/DB2 programmer and how to get it.
>
>Thanks
>
>Robert
post.title: [re] books (manual) for CICS/COBOL/DB2 programmer
